Articles.Content:
Banned because I am in fact a certified member of the Totally Legit I Am Not Making This Up Corporation which somehow means that my made up corporation is in fact not made up.

Oh crap, I think they are on to me! I need to evacuate to Duna NOW!!!

Edited January 30, 2014 by mikeman7918
Banned because I have a summer home on Duna.
Banned for not having a summer home, like me, on Arrakis (Dune)
Banned because I will now go back to the roof of the VAB while you are still looking for me on Duna. i iz so smrt.
Banned for leaving the rooftop door ajar.
Banned for doors.
Banned for quoting portal 2. I have reason to believe that a portal gun is impossible
banned for only 12 posts

Banned for being banned by an awesome person

Edited January 30, 2014 by mikeman7918
Banned for false advertising
Banned for BURN!

Banned because it does not burn as much as my gahilumofershwartinheimerfalomarbalmpacaterminator which will give you antidisestablishmentarianism and is also known to combobulate discombobulators.

Edited January 31, 2014 by mikeman7918
Banned for making my thinky-box hurt.
Banned for referring to your brain in a non-scientific manner.
Banned for referring to your universal thought processor in a non-technical manner.
Banned for using the word universal to refer to something that is very localized.
Banned for attempting to lift off the launch pad rather then actually lifting off like I usually do. (I never said it always went we'll after that, but that is not the point)
Banned for implying that my attempts to get off the launch pad fail.

Banned because I have personally seen all of your launches from my house on the roof of the VAB. I may have not been paying any attention to what was going on, but the important thing is that I was there.
Banned for having a house on the VAB. The roof of the VAB is off-limits to everyone because of the kraken that lives there.
Banned because I got pest control to make the Kraken move to the "surface" of Jool
Banned for aggravating the Kraken... and only just after I'd sung him to sleep, too.
Banned for singing to the Kraken. It only listens to Dubstep.
Banned for implying that Dubstep is music.

Banned for banning, that has banned someone else that has banned someone else that has banned someone else that had banned someone else that had banned someone elseÃ¢â‚¬Â¦
